V0.1.0.description:
initial public release for Spirit Valley Archipelago



INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:

CLIENT:
- Have Spirit Valley Installed
- Download Spirit Valley Archipelago plugin (See Releases for latest version)
- Extract and copy the contents of "Spirit Valley Archipelago Client V#.#.#.zip" to the directory where "SpiritValley.exe" is

APWORLD (needed for generating archieplago game):
- Have Archipelago Launcher Installed (latest release found here: https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases/latest )
- Download Spirit Valley APWorld (See Releases for latest version)
- Select "Install APWorld" in launcher and select Spirit Valley APWorld you downloaded
- Restart launcher for APWorld to properly install
- (Optional but Recomended)Select "Generate Template Options" to generate default spirit valley YMAL
V0.1.0.title: Spirit Valley Archipelago V0.1.0

V0.1.1.description:
- fix error on spirit level-up when spirit has no evolution
- added debug dump for slotdata

V0.1.0 changelog

V0.1.2.description:
- fix items being lost between game sessions
- added "$resync" and "$resync.items" console codes
- added console line to advance main quest for unlock Evergreen Outpost Bridge when player already has Power Crystal Item but isn't on Bridge Crossing Quest

V0.1.1 changelog
- fix error on spirit level-up when spirit has no evolution
- added debug dump for slotdata

V0.1.0 changelog
- initial public release for Spirit Valley Archipelago

V0.1.2.title: Spirit Valley Archipelago V0.1.2

V0.2.0.description:
- added map rando
- - randomises entry/exit between maps
- - might take a couple of attempts to properly generate at the moment
- - logic should work properly
- - Oakwoodvillage clinic and HQ are not randomised
- added warp rando
- - adds warp cords items that you need to be able to warp to their location
- added options to set player starting gender, hair, hair color and outfit NOTE these can be changed ingame by interacting with the wardrobe in the oakwood village house
- added option to modify XP gained between 0% - 10,000%
- added warning for when APWorld or game Client is not the version expected
- fixed location for enemy's on Trail 21
- made the player start with 5 spirit crystals


INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:

CLIENT:
- Have Spirit Valley Installed
- Download Spirit Valley Archipelago plugin (See Releases for latest version)
- Extract and copy the contents of "Spirit Valley Archipelago Client V#.#.#.zip" to the directory where "SpiritValley.exe" is

APWORLD (needed for generating archieplago game):
- Have Archipelago Launcher Installed (latest release found here: https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases/latest )
- Download Spirit Valley APWorld (See Releases for latest version)
- Select "Install APWorld" in launcher and select Spirit Valley APWorld you downloaded
- Restart launcher for APWorld to properly install
- (Optional but Recomended)Select "Generate Template Options" to generate default spirit valley YMAL

- made the player start with 5 spirit crystals

V0.3.0.description:
- add move randomization for Power, Accuracy, Priority, Stamina and Type
- fix missing logic for some chests behind boulders
- added various warp commands to make traversing game easier use "$warp list" to see all available warps
- fixed Universal Tracker logic problems

V0.4.0.description:
- added 3 save slots so multiple games can be run at once this also saves the login details for the slot for simpler connecting NOTE saves will be marked for deletion next client restart once the goal has been reached
- added archipelago.json to APWorld for archipelago 0.7.0 compatibility
- added map randomiser options for changing how the map gets randomised

V0.5.0.description:
- fixed error when not randomizing spawns
- removed EV-3 locations when not randomizing spawns
- fixed properly saving connection details when they are wrong
- added pressing F9 before connecting to a slot will allow for overriding save slots connection details
- added options for trainer vision and if they spin/rotate

V0.5.1.description:
- fixed "EV-3" location rules causing error when Randomise_Spawns was set to False
- fix error with not enough items to fill locations when Rare_Locations was set to False

V0.5.0 change log
- fixed error when not randomizing spawns
- removed EV-3 locations when not randomizing spawns
- fixed properly saving connection details when they are wrong
- added pressing F9 before connecting to a slot will allow for overriding save slots connection details
- added options for trainer vision and if they spin/rotate

V1.0.0.description:
- added Deathlink
- added option to limit catches per route/location to 1
- fixed some issues with Waystones
- fixed centiboob side quests not sending locations when completed
- added code to modify dialog of characters to be the correct spirit required
- fixed issues with archdata not loading completely when restoring session
-  added warnings/fixes when conflicting YMAL options are detected
